  • Constructor Details

    • App

      public App()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method is the entry point of the program. It prompts the user to select a type of map and a type of hash, reads a JSON file containing student data, and provides a menu for searching students by name or nationality.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments passed to the program.

    • printMenuMap

      public static void printMenuMap()
      Prints the menu for selecting the type of map to store the Students. The available options are HashMap, TreeMap, and LinkedHashMap.

    • printMenuHash

      public static void printMenuHash()
      Prints the menu options for selecting a hash type. The available hash types are: 1. Org√°nica 2. MD5 3. SHA-1

    • searchStudentbyKey

      public static Students searchStudentbyKey(Scanner scanner, Ihash hashMethod, AbstractMap<String,Students> map)
      Searches for a student in the map using a given key.
      Parameters:
      scanner - the scanner object used to read user input
      hashMethod - the hash method used to generate the key
      map - the map containing the students
      Returns:
      the student object if found, null otherwise

    • searchStudentbyNati

      public static void searchStudentbyNati(Scanner scanner, AbstractMap<String,Students> map)
      Searches for students by nationality in the given map and prints the results.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used to read user input.
      map - The map containing the students.

    • saveByNationality

      public static AbstractMap<String,List<Students>> saveByNationality(AbstractMap<String,Students> map, List<String> studentNames)
      Saves the students from the given map by their nationality.
      Parameters:
      map - The map containing the students.
      studentNames - The list of student names to save.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are the nationalities and the values are lists of students belonging to that nationality.
